personal_data.title: Personal Data / GDPR
personal_data.paragraph_1: Mynte Studio is committed to protecting your privacy and handling your personal data with care and in compliance with applicable data protection laws, including UAE data protection regulations and the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) where applicable.
personal_data.paragraph_2: We do not collect personal data through automated means on our website. Any personal data you provide to us (such as name, email address, or phone number) is collected only when you voluntarily submit it through contact forms or direct communication. This data is processed solely for the purpose of responding to your inquiries and providing the services you request.
personal_data.paragraph_3: We do not use analytics tools, tracking technologies, or third-party services that collect personal information. Your data is not shared with third parties, sold, or used for marketing purposes without your explicit consent. We retain personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected.
personal_data.paragraph_4: Under GDPR, EU residents have the right to access, rectify, erase, restrict processing, object to processing, and request portability of their personal data. To exercise any of these rights or for any data protection inquiries, please contact us at hello{'@'}mynte.studio.

cookies.title: Cookies / Tracking
cookies.paragraph_1: This website uses only strictly necessary cookies that are essential for the proper functioning and security of the website. These cookies do not collect or store any personal information and cannot be used to identify individual users.
cookies.paragraph_2: We do not use any tracking, analytics, advertising, or marketing cookies. We do not employ third-party tracking services such as Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, or any similar technologies. Your browsing activity on our website is not monitored, recorded, or analyzed.
cookies.paragraph_3: The essential cookies we use include session management cookies and security cookies that ensure the website functions correctly and securely. These cookies are automatically deleted when you close your browser.
cookies.paragraph_4: Since we only use strictly necessary cookies and do not process personal data through cookies, no consent banner is required under GDPR. If you have any questions about our cookie usage, please contact hello{'@'}mynte.studio.

Each project is tailored to meet the specific needs and objectives of our clients.

services_provided.paragraph_3: Any additional work, modifications, or services that fall outside the initially agreed scope will require prior written approval from both parties. Such additional work may incur extra charges based on the complexity, time required, and resources needed. Changes to the project scope will be documented through written amendments to the original agreement.

acceptance.paragraph_2: Contracts between Mynte Studio and the client may be formalized through various means including but not limited to: email confirmation, signed quotation or proposal, formal written agreement, or electronic acceptance through our website or platform.

acceptance.paragraph_4: These Terms of Service may be updated from time to time. The version applicable to any project is the version in effect at the time the contract is signed or the order is placed. Continued use of our services after updates constitutes acceptance of the revised terms.

pricing.title: Pricing and Payment
pricing.paragraph_1: All prices for services are indicated in the quotation or proposal provided to the client and are valid for the period specified in the document. Prices are quoted in the currency specified in the quotation (typically USD, AED, or EUR) and are subject to change if the project scope changes or if the validity period expires.
pricing.paragraph_2: Payments are accepted via bank transfer, credit card, or other payment methods as mutually agreed upon. Payment processing fees, if applicable, may be borne by the client or included in the total price as specified in the quotation.
pricing.paragraph_3: Standard payment terms require a 50% deposit upfront before work commences, with the remaining 50% due upon project completion and delivery. Alternative payment schedules may be specified in individual quotations for larger projects (e.g., milestone-based payments or monthly retainers for ongoing services).
pricing.paragraph_4: Late payments may incur a penalty of 1.5% per month (or the maximum rate allowed by applicable law, whichever is lower) calculated on the outstanding amount. Mynte Studio reserves the right to suspend work or withhold deliverables until payment obligations are fulfilled.
pricing.paragraph_5: All prices are exclusive of applicable taxes unless otherwise stated. Clients are responsible for any taxes, duties, or charges imposed by their local jurisdiction.

duration.title: Duration and Termination
duration.paragraph_1: The duration of services is specified in the contract, quotation, or project proposal. For one-time projects, the service period extends from the contract signing until final delivery and acceptance. For ongoing services such as maintenance or retainer agreements, the duration and renewal terms are clearly stated in the agreement.
duration.paragraph_2: Either party may terminate the contract with written notice in case of material breach, non-performance, or violation of the terms outlined in the agreement. The notice period and specific conditions for termination are defined in the individual contract.
duration.paragraph_3: Termination of services does not exempt the client from paying for work already performed, services rendered, or costs incurred up to the date of termination. Upon termination, the client remains obligated to pay all outstanding invoices and fees for completed deliverables.
duration.paragraph_4: In the event of termination, Mynte Studio will provide the client with all completed work and deliverables that have been paid for. Work-in-progress or incomplete deliverables will be provided at Mynte Studio's discretion, potentially with an adjusted fee based on the work completed.
duration.paragraph_5: For ongoing service agreements, either party may choose not to renew the contract by providing written notice within the timeframe specified in the agreement (typically 30 days before the renewal date).

responsibilities.paragraph_6: Mynte Studio is not liable for indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages including but not limited to loss of profits, revenue, data, or business opportunities, even if advised of the possibility of such damages.
